meta.name: Matlock
meta.description: After achieving success in her younger years, the brilliant septuagenarian Madeline Matlock rejoins the work force at a prestigious law firm where she uses her unassuming demeanor and wily tactics to win cases and expose corruption from within.

videos.title: Call It a Christmas Gift
videos.overview: With the holidays approaching, the team's secrets start to come to light while they take on a harassment case involving the city's fire department. Matty and Edwin contemplate meeting Joey's sister. Meanwhile, Sarah makes a shocking confession that could put her entire relationship with Olympia at risk.

videos.title: Prior Bad Acts
videos.overview: Olympia works to repair her relationship with her family after she takes on a case involving her mother's new husband. Also, Matty and Olympia receive a shocking piece of information.

videos.title: Call It a Christmas Gift

videos.title: Call It a Christmas Gift
videos.overview: With the holidays approaching, some mysteries start to come to light while taking on a case involving the city's fire department; Matty and Edwin contemplate meeting Joey's sister.

videos.title: Pilot
videos.overview: After achieving success in her younger years, brilliant septuagenarian Madeline Matlock uses her unassuming demeanor to make her way into a position at a prestigious law firm, Jacobson Moore.

videos.title: Rome, in a Day
videos.overview: Olympia and the aptly nicknamed "Team You Three" take on a lawsuit involving a developmentally delayed teenager whose family claims he's been wrongly accused of murder; Olympia and Julian disagree on a parenting matter.

videos.title: A Guy Named Greg
videos.overview: Matty's rusty trial skills are put to the test during a wrongful termination case by a woman claiming she was sexually harassed by her boss. Also, the firm's jury consultant and master lie detector, Shae, joins the case.

videos.title: The Rabbit and the Hawk
videos.overview: Olympia tasks Matty with getting close to their client, who is fighting for justice in the wrongful death of his wife.

videos.title: Claws
videos.overview: A big class-action case against the prison system hits close to home for Matty when its lead plaintiff, jailed on drug charges, relapses.

videos.title: Sixteen Steps
videos.overview: As Olympia and Julian get a second shot at a case regarding a death due to contaminated baby formula, their past work on the investigation gives glimpses into what led to their divorce; Matty's overwhelming stress causes her to consider quitting.

videos.title: Belly of the Beast
videos.overview: Matty works on a case with Julian in which a young woman sues after experiencing severe symptoms from a clinical trial; at the company holiday party, Olympia learns a secret about Julian's past.

videos.title: No, No Monsters
videos.overview: Olympia defends a defamed nanny at her children's school; Matty is on a stressful hunt for an important document on the Wellbrexa case.

videos.title: Friends
videos.overview: Matty helps Olympia take on Elijah's cousin's wrongful termination case. Also, Edwin worries that the longer Matty remains at Jacobson Moore, the more she puts herself in danger of being caught.

videos.title: Crash Helmets On
videos.overview: Matty and Sarah pose as grandmother and granddaughter in order to gather information at a senior living facility facing a wrongful death suit.

videos.title: A Traitor in Thine Own House
videos.overview: Tensions rise as Shae works with Olympia's team on a case for a tech startup that's had trade secrets stolen.

videos.title: This Is That Moment
videos.overview: Olympia and Julian's issues intensify as they each represent opposing sides in a nasty custody case. Also, Matty uses the firm's security system to her advantage.

videos.title: Pregame
videos.overview: An important class-action lawsuit leads the team to investigate a sorority. Also, Matty brings Alfie with her to Jacobson Moore on Family Day.

videos.title: Game Day
videos.overview: Olympia hires an outside party to select jurors rather than using Shae, putting the case at risk.

videos.title: Game Face
videos.overview: Olympia's partnership dream hangs in the balance as she and her team race against the clock to get a dangerous drink off the market.

videos.title: The Johnson Case
videos.overview: Olympia tries to impress the partnership board by taking on a complicated murder case.

videos.title: I Was That, Too
videos.overview: A pregnant woman asks for Olympia's help obtaining a divorce from her husband, whose family is a client of the firm.

videos.title: Tricks of the Trade – Part One
videos.overview: When Sarah's client is arrested after his business partner is found murdered, Billy attempts to help her handle the case while Matty and Olympia contend with a pressing confidential matter.

videos.title: Tricks of the Trade – Part Two
videos.overview: When Sarah's client is arrested after his business partner is found murdered, Billy attempts to help her handle the case while Matty and Olympia contend with a pressing confidential matter.

videos.title: The Before Times
videos.overview: Matty questions the paternity of the man claiming to be Alfie's father. Also, the team takes on an arson case while Olympia tries to protect Julian's involvement in the Wellbrexa case.

videos.title: Another Matlock
videos.overview: While the team is tasked with protecting a witness, Matty and Olympia square off over the Wellbrexa document. Also, Matty and Edwin contemplate whether or not to help Alfie's father.

videos.title: Tomorrow Is Still Tomorrow
videos.overview: Matty and Olympia find out that the executive committee has flown in after learning of a security breach at the firm. Also, the team takes on a case involving competing hot chicken restaurants.

videos.title: Piece of My Heart
videos.overview: As Olympia and the team take on a wrongful death case, Matty meets with a mysterious woman from Senior's past. Also, Matty reflects on her relationship with her daughter.

videos.title: Mousetrap
videos.overview: Matty and Olympia race to protect each other from Julian's suspicions as they also work on the resentencing case of a teenager sentenced as an adult to life.

videos.title: Harm Reduction
videos.overview: Matty and Olympia continue to test the boundaries of their friendship while helping a group of nuns. Meanwhile, Olympia and Sarah become roped into secretive activities within the firm.

videos.title: Prior Bad Acts
videos.overview: Olympia works to repair her relationship with her family after she takes on a case involving her mother's new husband. Also, Matty and Olympia receive a shocking piece of information.

videos.title: Call It a Christmas Gift
videos.overview: With the holidays approaching, the team's secrets start to come to light while they take on a harassment case involving the city's fire department. Matty and Edwin contemplate meeting Joey's sister. Meanwhile, Sarah makes a shocking confession that could put her entire relationship with Olympia at risk.
